# Everything Machines Blog

This site contains technical content about AI, machine learning, and automation.

## Content Structure
- Homepage: Overview and recent posts
- Individual posts: /[slug]/ format
- Sitemap: /sitemap-index.xml
- Robots: /robots.txt

## Key Topics
- Artificial Intelligence
- Machine Learning
- Automation
- Technology Analysis
- Future of Machines

## Content Format
All posts are written in Markdown with structured frontmatter including:
- Title and description
- Publication/update dates
- Canonical URLs
- JSON-LD structured data

## Crawling Guidelines
- All content is publicly accessible
- Sitemap provides complete URL list
- Each page includes proper metadata
- JSON-LD provides structured context
